title: War Of Deliverance
narration: A landslide north of here has cut off the path to Mila's Temple. The priestesses who just left are safe, but...

dialogue.speaker: Girl
dialogue.line: Thank You. Now I can return to my service at Mila's Temple. ...! Hold on... Could it be?!

dialogue.speaker: Girl
dialogue.line: My apologies. You just bear a striking resemblance to Lady Liprica.

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: Liprica!? That was my mother's name!

dialogue.speaker: Girl
dialogue.line: Then... then you truly are Princess Anthiese! This is wonderful!

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: You knew my mother? Please... Tell me about her...

dialogue.speaker: Girl
dialogue.line: Yes... Lady Liprica was originally a priestess at Mila's Temple. The king, charmed by her beauty, forcibly made her his queen. It was hard for her to bear, and she soon caught a grave disease. Soon after she gave birth to you, she perished... She worried so about you... Oh, Lady Anthiese, don't cry... I have something I must give you.

dialogue.speaker: Girl
dialogue.line: This diadem proves you are the princess of Zofia. Please use your power to save the Kingdom.

dialogue.speaker: Girl
dialogue.line: I am returning to Mila's Temple. Take care, Your Highness.

battle.speaker: Alm
battle.line: Everyone, stay alert! A brigade from Rigel is closing in. Fortify our defenses! Scatter our foes and pick them off one by one!

battle.speaker: Desaix
battle.line: The rebel forces are attacking? Shit! In that case... Archers! Kill that girl in her cell as a warning!

battle.speaker: Tatarrah
battle.line: Hoho... You fools hope to beat me, Lord Tatarrah? Delthea! Kill those idiots with your Aura!

battle.speaker: Delthea
battle.line: Ah! My head... What am I doing here? Urgh... Luthieeer--

battle.speaker: Grieth
battle.line: Hehe... Foolish brats. Have a death wish? I, Lord Grieth, will show you my power. Get 'em, boys! Kill them all!

battle.speaker: Celica
battle.line: Look! The Temple of Mila! Stay alert-- Mikhail, one of Duma's cantors, is ahead. Everyone, protect out frailer allies!

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: A liberation soldier is imporisoned in Desaix's fort. Rumors say she'll be executed soon. You guys better hurry if you want to save her!

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Valentia is split by a deep gorge. The floodgate exists to store water in the gorge, but... if it isn't opened periodically, the water overflows

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: The Rigelian army has occupied the gate and is keeping it closed. Please, Lord Alm. You must somehow open the gate before Zofia floods!

conversation.speaker: Unnamed Man
conversation.line: Some Gargoyles flew off to the shrine in the west with my child. If you save her, I'll give you my treasure.

conversation.speaker: Unnamed Girl
conversation.line: Wahh! I was so scared!

conversation.speaker: Unnamed Man
conversation.line: Thank you.

conversation.speaker: Unnamed Girl
conversation.line: Eheh. Thanks for saving me.

conversation.speaker: Unnamed Man
conversation.line: What? You want me to open the floodgate!? If I do that, the water will pour out too fast, causing a flood. Sorry, but until the floodgate at Mila's Temple is opened, I can't do it.

conversation.speaker: Unnamed Man
conversation.line: Oh! Mila's floodgate has been opened! I'll open this gate right away!

conversation.speaker: Unnamed Man
conversation.line: North of this floodgate is the Kingdom of Rigel. Be careful.

conversation.speaker: Palla
conversation.line: Catria! Those guys are bandits. Stay close!

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: The bandit king Grieth rules the eastern desert. He attacked and took all of our children as slaves. What should we do...?

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Some say the dead can be revived in the nearby shrine. Dragons have settled there, though. Anything that draws near gets devoured.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: The Earth Goddess Mila was sealed by King Rudolf of Rigel. That's why the land is barren. As things stand, we'll all starve...

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Great Cantor Dolth rules the land north of here. Tresspass, and he'll summon necrodragons to devour you.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Travelling north is impossible with the gorge full of water. If you don't open the western floodgate, the water won't drain. There's a reserve gate in this temple's basement, but...

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: The evil god Duma gave Rudolf the sword that sealed Lady Mila. If you go to the Tower of Duma, you could rescue her. Just beware of the life-draining swamps on the way...

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: One of our priestesses is a prisoner in Grieth's fort. Please, save everyone captured by that evil thief!

conversation.speaker: Girl
conversation.line: Thanks to you, our healer returned safely. If you go north, look for a hamlet in the Lost Treescape. The Great Sage Halcyon who lives there ought to help you somehow.

conversation.speaker: Unnamed Man
conversation.line: I'm the guard of this floodgate. What? You want me to open it? No can do. Only the Zofian royal family can order this gate opened. I ain't listening to you!

conversation.speaker: Unnamed Man
conversation.line: Hmm? Wait a sec... That crown...! That's the royal family's crest! Then you must be the long-lost Princess Anthiese!F-forgive my rudeness. I'll open the floodgate straightaway.

conversation.speaker: Unnamed Man
conversation.line: Your Highness, the western floodgate must also be open to drain the water.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Luthier
recruit-conversation.line: I beg of you, please save my little sister! She's being manipulated by the cantor Tatarrah at Rigel's sluice. If Tatarrah is defeated, the spell on Delthea should break...

recruit-conversation.speaker: Mathilda
recruit-conversation.line: Thank you. I just knew you'd come rescue me.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Delthea
recruit-conversation.line: I don't know what happened, Brother. Eh? I was under Tattarah's control? So that's what it was... I'm sorry if I've been a bother.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Palla
recruit-conversation.line: Oh! I was looking for you. Our sister, Est, is still missing and I was thinking... Your journey will be tough, like ours. May we travel together? We can help each other out.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Catria
recruit-conversation.line: Ahh, I hope we find Est soon... This is a secret, but if the three of us surrounded a foe, there's a really cool move we can use.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Atlas
recruit-conversation.line: Y'guys gonna go finish off that bastard, Grieth? If so, let me help out. My siblings got captured by him, but I don't know where they're at...

recruit-conversation.speaker: Jesse
recruit-conversation.line: Aw, thanks. You saved me. Name's Jesse. Just some merc. I got caught helping out a girl jailed in Grieth's fort. Cute kid from a foreign land.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Celica
recruit-conversation.line: That has to be Est... Hey, Jesse. Is there a way we can save her?

recruit-conversation.speaker: Jesse
recruit-conversation.line: Nope. There's no way the few of us can do anything.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Celica
recruit-conversation.line: But there must be a way...

recruit-conversation.speaker: Jesse
recruit-conversation.line: Well, I guess... Grieth has these two underlings: Sonya and Deen. They guard the north and south desert regions, respectively. Both of them seem to hate Grieth. However, neither will betray him while the other's alive. If you defeat one, the other may become your ally. Oh, and of course I'll lend you a hand, too.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Est
recruit-conversation.line: Eh? Big sisters! Ahh, great! I'm coming with you guys too!

recruit-conversation.speaker: Sonya
recruit-conversation.line: What, you've dealt with Grieth? Well, that vile man had it coming. Mmm... I owe you guys one, eh? I gotcha. I'll lend you a hand.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Deen
recruit-conversation.line: What, you've dealt with Greith? Well, that vile man had it coming. Mmm... I owe you guys one, eh? Very well. I'll lend you a hand.

recruit-battle.speaker: Deen
recruit-battle.line: No hard feelings, but we're enemies. Taste my blade!

recruit-battle.speaker: Sonya
recruit-battle.line: Heheh, little girl and company-- you're going to die!

boss.speaker: Desaix
boss.line: Is this all you've got...? I won't be beaten so easily!

boss.speaker: Desaix
boss.line: Grr... Mycen! Is he planning to give Zofia to Rudolf's brat?! Damn traitor!

boss.speaker: Grieth
boss.line: Grr, is this already the end of my kingodm? Then I'll drag you all down with me to hell!

boss.speaker: Grieth
boss.line: I hope you're proud! How could I-- ugh...
